fees.label: Shut off & Restoration of Service Fee (each)
fees.details: Service shut off for any reason and/or restored. $60/hour after first hour, billed in 15-minute increments.

policies: Damage to Authority property billed at actual cost + 10% administrative fee.
If Owner fails to allow meter repair/inspection after 60 days of notice, a flat rate of $150.00 per EDU per quarter applies until fixed or service terminated.

fees.label: Meter Tests — In-house (HBBA)
fees.details: Includes removal/reinstall up to 1 hour + test procedure. Extra labor at hourly repair rate; parts at cost + 5%.

fees.label: Meter Tests — Outside provider
fees.details: Minimum; plus labor beyond first hour at repair rates; any other Authority costs + 5%.
